name: I love you #8 (slowly)
description:
‘I love you’ is an ongoing series of artworks by John Elliott based around randomly changing phrases describing the ebb and flow of human actions and emotions: good, bad, happy, sad, funny, painful, loving, hateful, greedy, selfless, generous.

The works are virtual text based drawings, each piece changes a small aspect of the original (#1 valentine).

Original artwork by John Elliott, 2021

Made with JavaScript (no dependencies).

Series homepage: https://iloveyou.ifiwasageneticengineer.com
